entity.name: Andrew Cuomo
entity.description: Governor of New York, Andrew Cuomo

text:
@NYGovCuomo Wow, that could have been useful back in March when nursing homes were forced by you to take COVID19 positive patients.  
Well, thanks to your former policy, I suppose there’s now plenty of vacancy now in these homes to get it right this time around.
